name: PutPot (Pre-Alpha 1.0)
description:
This is a spot where you will be able to pay alpha and/or beta versions of my game.

The game is playable on Windows, Mac, Linux and in HTML.

The game is currently in development.

Controls:

W/Up Arrow: Forward

S/Down Arrow: Backwards

A/Left Arrow: Left

D/Right Arrow:  Right

ESC: Quit

Any kind of feedback is appreciated
